price: 10. Mpe tosilaki kopesa bino bokonzi ya kofanda na mabele mpe totielaki bino libiki ya bomoyi o kati na yango, kasi токе nde bozali kotondo.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad makkannākum fī al-arḍi wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha qalīlan mā tashkurūna
